title: Chiefs-Ravens MNF Recap: Mahomes, Kansas City prove why they're the best once again (Football 9/29)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech break down the Chiefs 34-20 statement victory on the road against the Ravens on Monday Night Football. Patrick Mahomes was superb, Lamar Jackson wasn't his usual self and Kansas City proved why they are the defending champs and favorites to win it all again this year. The Superfriends have all the analysis!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en

Patrick Mahomes was superb, Lamar Jackson wasn't his usual self and Kansas City proved why they are the defending champs and favorites to win it all again this year.
